task.name: cgisch
task.string: Considering your total clinical experience with patients with schizophrenia, how severely ill has the patient been during the last week?
1. Positive symptoms (e.g. hallucinations, delusions or bizarre behaviour)
2. Negative symptoms (e.g. affective flattening, avolition or anhedonia)
3. Depressive symptoms (e.g. sadness, depressed mood or hopelessness)
4. Cognitive symptoms (e.g. impaired attention, concentration or memory)
Compared to the previous evaluation (*), how much has the patient changed? Rate improvement whether or not, in your judgement, it is due entirely to treatment.
(*) In treatment trials with several evaluation points, use ‘Compared to the phase immediately preceding this treatment trial’ instead of ‘Compared to the previous evaluation’.
